sentences.sContent: It should be sweet, very intoxicant.
sentences.sCn: 它应该是甜甜的，很醉人的。

sentences.sContent: Now evening what evening, in the air has filled the intoxicant happiness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now evening what evening, in the air has filled the intoxicant happiness.
sentences.sCn: 今夕何夕，空气里都充满了醉人的甜蜜。

sentences.sContent: In a word, a man in a crowd behaves as though he had swallowed a large dose of some powerful intoxicant.
sentences.sContent_eng: In a word, a man in a crowd behaves as though he had swallowed a large dose of some powerful intoxicant.
sentences.sCn: 总之，群体中个人的表现就像注射了大剂量的麻醉药一样。

words.tran: 醉人的；令人陶醉的；使兴奋的
使陶醉；醉酒；使中毒（intoxicate的ing形式）
